panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC002 - Network latency (Ping)

Evaluation of network latency (RTT - round trip time) between two VM instances running on different physical blades. For more information see TC002

targets.query: SELECT "rtt.ares" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc002" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC005 - Storage Performance (Fio)

To evaluate the IaaS storage performance with regards to IOPS, throughput and latency. For more information see TC005

targets.query: SELECT "read_bw" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc005" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"
SELECT "read_iops" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc005" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC010 - Memory Latency (Lmbench)

Measure the memory read latency for varying memory sizes and strides. Whole memory hierarchy is measured including all levels of cache. For more information see TC010

targets.query: SELECT "latencies0.latency" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc010" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC011 - Packet delay variation (Iperf3)

Measure the packet delay variation sending the packets from one VM to the other. For more information see TC011

targets.query: SELECT "end.sum.jitter_ms" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc011" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "task_id", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC012 - Memory read and write bandwidth

Visualisation of memory read and write bandwidth using lmbench as the measurement tool. For more information see TC012

targets.query: SELECT "bandwidth(MBps)" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc012" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC069 - Memory read and write bandwidth (RAMspeed)

Visualisation of memory read and write bandwidth using RAMspeed as the measurement tool. For more information see TC069

targets.query: SELECT "Result0.Bandwidth(MBps)" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc069" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario"

panels.title: Number of cores and threads, available memory size and cache size

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC071 - Network Latency, Throughput, Packet Loss and Cache Utilization

Visualisation of network latency (RTT - round trip time), packet throughput and Cache utilization when doing variations to the amount of UDP flows between two VM instances running on different physical blades. For more information see TC071

targets.query: SELECT "average.used" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc070" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

SELECT "average.free" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc070" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

panels.content:
OPNFV_Yardstick_TC072 - Network Latency, Throughput, Packet Loss and Network Utilization

Visualisation of network latency (RTT - round trip time), packet throughput and Network interface utilization when doing variations to the amount of UDP flows between two VM instances running on different physical blades. For more information see TC072

targets.query: SELECT "average.used" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc070" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"

SELECT "average.free" FROM "opnfv_yardstick_tc070" WHERE "pod_name" =~ /$POD$/ AND "deploy_scenario" =~ /$SCENARIO$/ AND "version" =~ /$VERSION$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name", "deploy_scenario", "task_id"
